description: This file contains test cases for verifying the structured response handling of an AI agent, including models for movie scripts and recipes, and tests for their responses.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing a movie script with fields for setting, ending, genre, name, characters, storyline, and rating.

classes.name: Grade
classes.description: An enumeration for movie ratings with values A+, A, B, C, D, F.

classes.name: Recipe
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing a recipe with a name and a rating of type Grade.

methods.name: test_structured_response_with_dict_fields
methods.description: Test function that verifies the response content for a movie script with dictionary fields.

methods.name: test_structured_response_with_enum_fields
methods.description: Test function that verifies the response content for a recipe with an enum rating.
